heading: Sunday
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow developing south, spreading north in the afternoon becoming moderate to heavy at times. Remaining cold. Highs near 10 north, in the teens elsewhere. Calm wind.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Steady snow showers continuing. Lows in the single digits to near 10 degrees, a few negatives in the north. Light northeast wind.

heading: Monday
text: Snow, heaviest south. Highs from near 10 into the teens into the north, increasing into the upper teens to near 20 as you head south.
